law.catch_line: Court security officers -- Minimum qualifications -- Exceptions.

text.section: A court security officer employed on or before June 26, 2007, shall comply with the requirements of subsection (1) of this section within six (6) months of June 26, 2007.

A peace officer who has previously attended law enforcement basic training and met the certification requirements of KRS 15.380 and 15.382 shall not be required to meet the requirements of this section to be appointed a court security officer, but shall meet the requirements of KRS 15.386(3).

law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 1, effective June 26, 2007.
